text: Now therefore send me a man skilful to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass, and in iron, and in purple, and crimson, and blue, and that knoweth how to grave <FI>all manner of<Fi> gravings, <FI>to be<Fi> with the skilful men that are with me in Judah and in Jerusalem, whom David my father did provide.
name: II Chronicles 2:7
